titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, to Abraham Nickson Hojel

physicalDescription.extent: This letter has been written onto a loose sheet of paper which has been placed in the letterbook at the appropriate place chronologically.

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Hojel's recent language and actions towards Captain Way and the household servants, which Pelly believes was inappropriate and recommending he recall the letter and arrange the matter in order that attention is not drawn to his behaviour by Government or the Persian authorities.
